jahidul.projectideas.ctrl

Class IdeaBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • jahidul.projectideas.ctrl.AbstractBean
      • jahidul.projectideas.ctrl.IdeaBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="ideaBean")
 @SessionScoped
public class IdeaBean
extends AbstractBean
implements java.io.Serializable
    Any functions needed for the management of any Idea Objects
    Author:
    Jahidul Pabel Islam, 733474
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
